trs: I want the door closed.’\footnote{A reviewer asks whether \REF{ex:gluckman:12c} can be translated as ‘I want the door to be closed.’ We think this translation is misleading for two reasons: a) it either suggests a passive reading of this sentence, or, b) it suggests a stative reading.}
